definitions.definition: Any of various medium - large black seabirds of the family Phalacrocoracidae which dive into water for fish and other aquatic animals , found throughout the world except for islands in the centre of the Pacific Ocean ; specifically, the great cormorant ( Phalacrocorax carbo ).
A voracious eater ; also, a person who, or thing which, is aggressively greedy for wealth , etc.

main_definition: Any of various medium - large black seabirds of the family Phalacrocoracidae which dive into water for fish and other aquatic animals , found throughout the world except for islands in the centre of the Pacific Ocean ; specifically, the great cormorant ( Phalacrocorax carbo ).
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively , also attributively , archaic ) A voracious eater ; also, a person who, or thing which, is aggressively greedy for wealth , etc.
